website_summaries.verdict: A strong scrub brush with bristles designed to handle tough buildup and debris.
pros: Can tackle moss buildup, mold, and mildew
Stiff bristles can hold up under pressure but are not abrasive
No problems with brush shedding of bristles
cons: The handle is only 48-inches long, which can be a little short for taller users

customer_reviews.title: Great for sctubbing floors
customer_reviews.text: It's great for scrubbing the kitchen and bathroom floor, it's stiff and doesn't move so you can put force on it and get all the dirt off.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Broke first use!!! Cheap handle
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 30 seconds of use. Just scrubbing hallway. Handle broke right off. Contacted customer service and they didn’t offer any replacement or returns. Went to Home Depot bought craftsman for $15 and have lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.author: KAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Broke with first use...
customer_reviews.text: When I was putting this together I noticed that the screw into the scrub brush part was very unstable. I got halfway done with my porch and the thing completely broke. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice floor scrubber but doesn't do corners at all
customer_reviews.text: 1. Nice stiff bristles. 2. Front bristles soften after use. Pretty soon I see this not working. 3. Doesn't do corners well at all. 4. Collects hair much too easily and then it's a nightmare removing the hair from the bristles. Still better than anything in the local stores and it doesn't damage linoleum flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to clean our painted porch floor. My husband said it was much better than the sponge mop he used to use. He said the bristles were soft enough to not scratch but strong enough to scrub. He cleaned it after use and said he can use it again next time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: PhoebeS

customer_reviews.title: but I am super pleased! This i a durable and good quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried buying a brush without first touching and checking the quality, but I am super pleased! This i a durable and good quality scrub brush for me and I use it daily multiple times .. no issues with weak support, brush shedding, or general issues I have found with many local choices. This is great - good quality and I will be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Tamcan

customer_reviews.title: Saves you from house cleaning back pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite house cleaning tool! It is great for textured linoleum as you can really scrub the floor firmly without being on your hands and knees. I also use it in my bathtub. It is awesome for getting off soap scum off the bathtub without breaking your back!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Floors are clean and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Got my floor extra clean, my kitchen floor & bathroom floor never seemed clean enough. This scrubber is like the ones used for dishes only bigger with a scraper. I got my floors super clean, finally feels smooth. I am handicap so it's a little hard cleaning the floor but not any more.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Schloegel Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Libman CO 547 Floor Deck Scrub Brush and Handle
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly on very dirty vinyl floor. Brush stiff enough, but not abrasive. Handle made the job so much easier. Good price for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine N. Eppinger

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: This is not a stiff brush It’s also quite small
customer_reviews.author: In flight

customer_reviews.title: Scrub the floor in comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this floor/deck scrub brush to use on our old vinyl tile kitchen floor, rather than kneeling and scrubbing the floor by hand. It gets the deep cleaning job done quickly and comfortably, allowing us to use a steam cleaner for quick routine cleanups.
customer_reviews.author: ks227

customer_reviews.title: Great deck scrubber
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to get dried chicken poop off of my porch deck. Scrubbed a 12 x 20 foot deck in about 10 minutes. I was pleased with the brush and its durability. I was scrubbing very hard and it didn't give a bit . I was expecting to bend or ruin the threads on the handle. Held up well. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: W.T.Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Works great
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I have a rubber mat on my deck where we feed raccoons. The mat gets dirty and this is great to get it clean without getting on my hands and knees. Very sturdy, Does the job and great pricing!
customer_reviews.author: natalie creasman

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and exceptional cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrubber. Mops just do not get the kitchen floor as clean as I would like. This scrubber reaches in the varying textures of the tile and pulls up the dirt. The bristles have withstood vigorous scrubbing and the scraper is awesome. It is lightweight and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: CrunchyAdventurer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I could be here all day with all ways I've used this scrubber. It's that handy, and it takes a beating. Highly recommend for stand up shower floor.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ayoub

customer_reviews.title: brush works.
customer_reviews.text: decent pricing, great brush. I'm happy with the purchase and the giant box it was shipped in--probably could use some package rethinking from the 'Zon, but otherwise a useful and practical piece of equipment that one doesn't have to pick up at the store...
customer_reviews.author: D.Richmond

customer_reviews.title: HIghly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this! It's fantastic for a quick scrub of a floor! Got this one for my daughter who also loved it as much as I did. The seller was quick to ship too!
customer_reviews.author: stiz2003

customer_reviews.title: this scrub mop was exactly what I was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: this scrub mop was exactly what I was looking for - hard enough to get the job done but not to hard to destroy the rugs, floors, etc. Its made very well not cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Bellaporter

customer_reviews.title: Right Tool for the Job
customer_reviews.text: restoring heavy decking on two waterfront properties, scrubbing in oxygenated bleach prior to power wash, absolute right tool for the job, you can lean on this baby, it scrubs deep, prepped the dock beautiful, used extensively. sanded before staining, again, this brush cleaned all the nooks and crannies...good stain job only as good as the cleaning prep, this simple device helped make the job come out great...we used DEFY water based, semi-transparent, cedar stain, came out absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Hailmurray

customer_reviews.title: Great Scrub Brush
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stiff brush for scrubbing out stock tanks without having to bend over. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C Mills

customer_reviews.title: Delightfully Useful
customer_reviews.text: This deck scrubber is a sturdy, incredibly useful tool. From the rubber floormats, to the gritty basement floor to the actual decks, this is a great basic for anyone who wants an effective way to get things clean.
customer_reviews.author: McDeviance

customer_reviews.title: We use it to clean a brick deck.
customer_reviews.text: We use it to clean a brick deck. It is the best deck scrub brush we have used. We are satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Flash2520

customer_reviews.title: Great for an apt patio
customer_reviews.text: Great size! I got it for my patio in my apartment to scrub. Bristles and nice and strong to get the job done and they haven't bent yet at all after multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super well made with very stiff bristles that won't mush up when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlia Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Strong brush!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to clean our epoxy garage floor. It’s perfect for this job.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Tough bristles
customer_reviews.text: Tough bristles. I wanted to use it to scrub carpets, not for that. An angled brush would be better. Works well on concrete with some elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High-quality deck/floor brush.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality deck/floor brush that I've been looking for. We're using it in a project to clean concrete. The Brush works fantastically and is very durable. My only comment; The pole could be longer and universal with other screw-in poles.
customer_reviews.author: APShopper

customer_reviews.title: Not too soft, not too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and bristles are not too stiff, not too soft. Seems to be well made. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Length of handle is good for me. I scrubbed my entire deck with it and it did great.
customer_reviews.author: krc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job cleaning up our travertine pool deck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It serves it's purpose. Nothing wrong with it's design ...
customer_reviews.text: It serves it's purpose. Nothing wrong with it's design. It's simply smaller than I'd of preferred. Smaller brush, smaller handle. I also with the bristles were a bit stiffer. However, all of that is explained well in the description, so it's my own fault.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Storey

customer_reviews.title: Great scrub brush!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, sturdy long handle scrub brush. I have uneven stone floors and this is perfect for scrubbing them! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Crysta Liu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used the brush 4 times and the handle rusted from the inside-out and broke in half. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: CivilWoman

customer_reviews.title: Clean Baseboards
customer_reviews.text: Use on baseboards. Do not kill your back trying to bend down and scrub. Work smart and think of all the applications for a great heavy duty product like this one.
customer_reviews.author: mallory scott

customer_reviews.title: I like the brush and will definitely be using it on ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for what it was intended. I'm attempting to use it to scrub carpet and it works ok for that, but just wasn't what the product was intended to do. I like the brush and will definitely be using it on my patio though.
customer_reviews.author: Patty H.

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: This broom is well made. Seems like it will last for tough jobs!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent. I use this to clean my shower walls and the bathtub.. Edit: after about a year of use, the pipe is starting to rust at the bottom from being dipped in water and cleaning walls...
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need of applying liquid product to my outdoor concrete patio
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this to apply mold/mildew product on concrete patio. It is stiff enough to move the liquid product and also get it into the craggy concrete surface. Not too weighty as to be cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eye

customer_reviews.title: Used it on my Trex decking, wish it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my Trex decking, wish it was wider, but it covers a little more than one plank at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fairly sturdy for light sweeping. Light weight makes it easy on my aging back.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning the shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my stand-up, tiled shower. I just spray the walls and floor with cleaner and then scrub away with the broom. It's much less work than using a scrub brush.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but tough bristles and scrubs really well
customer_reviews.author: Kolby Holdren

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just wish it was bigger. The brush is stiff and works very well removing stubborn stains.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Great scrub brush for floors and decks
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy scrub brush. Added bonus the handle is metal.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M Galione

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Brush
customer_reviews.text: This is the best it gets. Clean your shower floor and walls and never bend over. My maid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Zakada

customer_reviews.title: It's a push broom
customer_reviews.text: We used it to scrub our patio. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific Northwest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not made for this, but grabs cat hair very effectively
customer_reviews.text: I use it to pull up all the cat hair and carpet shedding from wool area rugs - it gets more crud up than my vaccuum. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: BorgesUniverse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality scrubber for tile floors
customer_reviews.text: I've used this thing several times on our kitchen floors. Durable scrubber. No issues. Works as expected
customer_reviews.author: Sulli

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for any tough jobs
customer_reviews.text: Very small and non-durable handle. Would not recommend for any tough jobs.
customer_reviews.author: bakersam

customer_reviews.title: Will scuff boat
customer_reviews.text: Handle is very weak can't apply much pressure. Bristles are extremely stiff not allowing for any small radius.
customer_reviews.author: Moyers

customer_reviews.title: I love cleaning with this brush
customer_reviews.text: I love cleaning with this brush. It works on my tile floors, my deck and I even used it when cleaning the carpet to get some stains out
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my deck, light and easy to use, as well as sturdy and very well made. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Libman makes good products!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritic knees and this scrubber on a pole is going to be very welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! I got to the bottom of grime on my kitchen floor.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM SOLVED
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT IT FOR MY SHOWER PAN. I'M IN A WHEEL CHAIR AND THIS WAS ONE JOB I REALLY COULDN'T DO...TILL I GOT LIBMAN'S DECK BRUSH. NOW MY SHOWER PAN GLEAMS SPARKINGLY CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: CESSIE

customer_reviews.title: works great!! Sturdy handle and the bristles are just ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it to scrub the tile floors in my home...works great!! Sturdy handle and the bristles are just the right texture
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans tile grout well, one dislike when pressing hard to scrub grout the handle unscrews from the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma happyAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small brush with big results!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality scrubber. It is small and light weight. We've found it to be perfect for many uses around the house.
customer_reviews.author: jennpowell001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it looks great, just enough softness and strength that I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: CAWhite

customer_reviews.title: Hi Ho Hi Ho It's Off To Work They Go!
customer_reviews.text: Requested by The Humane Society of Greater Dayton (Ohio) who wanted 5. They seemed pretty happy when they arrived so I'm satisfied that they're satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I had hoped it'd do. I didn't want a wire brush fearful of scratching my pavers but wanted a stick brush that I could depend on and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Another great Libman product,been buying Libman for years, never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: This brush was perfect for scrubbing the algae from the sides of our above ground 25 ft. blow up pool. It's neither too soft OR too hard, and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: CHINATOUCHE1

customer_reviews.title: ... had time to use it once but did a great job. Not to hard not to soft
customer_reviews.text: Only had time to use it once but did a great job. Not to hard not to soft, gets dirt in those indentations in my flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Used to clean front porch and back ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Used to clean front porch and back deck, works great.
customer_reviews.author: VR

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and the perfect size for my apartment patio. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: For the Love of Dog

customer_reviews.title: Decent broom and brush.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to help clean up after flooding and mud. It does a decent job on cement but I think wire would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Redhorses

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for scrubbing RV rubber roof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for scrubbing RV rubber roof In preparation for rubber coating
customer_reviews.author: fig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good for scouring.Packaging was bad,i ordered 5 ,which would have fit in one box,bot i got 5 boxes...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush. Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Good Brush at a good price. Stiff enough to scrub most anything.
customer_reviews.author: Denoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bristles
customer_reviews.text: Minimumal to none pressure needed fk be applied when scrubbing floors
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Scrub Brush
customer_reviews.text: This scrub brush does a great job!! It is sturdy, too!! I recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lover

customer_reviews.title: No more excuse to have a dirty deck!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a filthy deck, this is an excellent scrubber. It's not going to do the job by itself, you do need some liquid like a deck cleaner or a water-bleach to kill the algae and lift the dirt, but this brush is excellent to scrub it up and then hose it off. The brush bristles are firm enough to really get into the nooks & crevices and get out the dirt, the handle is a good diameter to grip and long enough for tall people without hunching over too much. Really glad I got it!
customer_reviews.author: DaisyH

customer_reviews.title: PURRRRFECT
customer_reviews.text: PURRRRFECT to sweep cat hair from rugs!!!!I just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sister Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very general
customer_reviews.text: Very general, not sturdy and durable, cleaning effect is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Diane R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and durable and a good price. Made in U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: R. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it to scrub the dock. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jane boon

customer_reviews.title: Works great without having to stoop
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean the floor in my shower. Works great without having to stoop. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: pglsdal

customer_reviews.title: Deck looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Our outside deck had accumulated a good amount of algae/gunk over the winter. Power washing didn't get rid of it, but this brush and a bucket of water did! It's a plywood deck with a thick urethane coating with sand in it for texture.
customer_reviews.author: James P. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the price. I purchased it to clean my balcony and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for scrubbing garage floor with epoxy finish!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to scrub my garage floor which has a epoxy finish. The shorter handle is actually a perfect length for the task of putting pressure to lift up dirt. The bristles are sturdy and have shown no signs of getting squashed by high pressure scrubbing. It hasn't appeared to cause any damage to the epoxy clear coat. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B. Terrill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great broom...great price..easy way to wipe down walls and ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Al-ashqar

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This is a scrub brush. I does not whistle sing or dance. It also does not wake you up in the morning with a gentle nudge and a cup of coffee. What it does is scrub decks and it scrubs a deck very well for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake J.

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl deck floor
customer_reviews.text: have not used it yet but hope it works on the textured vinyl deck floor. Only minus was the hundreds of packing peanuts that came out of the box with the mop! too much packaging. It looks very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The long handle keeps you from having to bend over. A real back saver!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Breeden

customer_reviews.title: A very nice brush for sweeping and scrubbing
customer_reviews.text: A very nice scrub brush. Since it is made of synthetic fiber, it is useful for sweeping (dry) and scrubbing (wet).
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: SMALL w/SHORT HANDLE ----
customer_reviews.text: Nice broom, but quite small -- handle is not very long (and I am a female 5'7") --- works okay, but am not 'impressed' w/this for the price -- if I had know how small it was I would not have ordered. (Could be my fault for not checking the dimensions carefully).
customer_reviews.author: BlueSkyGal

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: I was all excited to start scrubbing floors. Well, i got a minute into scrubbing and damn if it the handle didn't collapse and break. So, basically, of you want extra trash, then definitely get this.....if you need something to actually scrub a floor....DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Elemental Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a great scrub brush for a kiddie pool being ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great scrub brush for a kiddie pool being used by dogs- but it was broken shortly thereafter by painting contractors. I don't honestly know what happened, but this appeared much sturdier than it apparently was. It was snapped off at the collet where the handle screws in.
customer_reviews.author: The Fairydogmother

customer_reviews.title: Scrub broom
customer_reviews.text: Nice scrub broom, but I don't know how they could justify the original price of $134.00. I bought it for $9.99 plus shipping which is more in line with what it is actually worth! I think I fell for the marketing gimmick!
customer_reviews.author: Rak

customer_reviews.title: deck brush
customer_reviews.text: My deck is made of materials that do not need to be painted, but in Seattle weather it can grow a lovely coat of moss. There are also several rhodies around the deck that deposit sticky flowers and sap on the deck. This brush cleaned off all the sticky and green that had built up over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredsysco2004

customer_reviews.title: Standing to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scrub brush so I could stand and not be on my knees to keep the grout clean between my tiles. I am 65 years old and this make it so much earier for me to clean. I very muck like the material the Brush bristles is made out of.
customer_reviews.author: Peachey

customer_reviews.title: Great product to scrub your deck
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scrub brush. I am using this to scrub all the mold and mildew off my deck (using Oxi Clean) and my deck is huge and has about 5 years of build up and it has not worn out yet! The handle is nice and sturdy as well because let me tell you I have put a lot of pressure on it and it has not broken.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Kang

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to scrub my basement floor. The pictures are of the first one I received and made a no hassle return/replacement. It does scrub the floor, 'ok'. This broom needs, more bristles, a longer handle and the scraper to be more pronounced. It's worth $10 at best.
customer_reviews.author: ShepLady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hunchbacked pool boys or underage chimney sweeps.
customer_reviews.text: The head is well made and the handle is strong enough for vigorous use. If you're over 5'6" the included handle is almost certainly going to be too short for you to scrub a floor comfortably for long periods. It worked for one project but I'll definitely be replacing the handle with something longer.
customer_reviews.author: aboniks

customer_reviews.title: Should be used for rougher surfaces, it's not stiff enough for polished concrete
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for the super stiff bristles. These are stiff, but not super-scrubbing stiff. I have a polished concrete floor and I did soften the dried up paint with hot water hoping that it would easily come off just like how I can rub it with my fingernail, but this brush can't do it. It is good for rougher surfaces like unpolished concrete and sweeps well in that case. I'm giving it 3 stars because it meets my standards of what a "SCRUB" brush should do, it's too bad it's only good enough for rough surfaces and not harden smoother surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: K Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for scrubbing venal floors, long term grime came right off. no floor damage either
customer_reviews.author: sarah e haynes

customer_reviews.title: Brush head came off first use.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well while it worked. Brush head came off first time I used it. Too much trouble to return. May try superglue.
customer_reviews.author: ko

customer_reviews.title: works great on textured linoleum!
customer_reviews.text: I finally bought one of the these brushes and gave the kitchen floor a good scrubbing. It works very well and is very sturdy! Our floor was cleaner with the brush scrubbing than it was after giving it a good hands/knees scrubbing...and so much easier! Long handle and no back pain while scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Short handle not optimal for users over 5’10”
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but as a 6’ tall person, the handle is too short to use without being bent over constantly which is overly tiring. I’m in decent physical condition as an athlete person, so it’s not a huge problem, but I imagine an hour or so of scrubbing In a bent over position would exhaust your average user.
customer_reviews.author: watermonkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect floor scrub brush
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike unless it was a brush that automatically scrubbed the floor. Bristle stiffness is good. The diminsions of the brush are perfect for applying pressure and “elbow grease” to those tough to clean spots. It is sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: ME

product_meta.title: Libman 547 Floor Scrub with Built-in Scraper, 1-(Pack), Multi
product_meta.description: This floor scrub from Libman uses 2 1/4in. long polymer fibers in a resin block to create a 10 1/2in. x 3 1/2in. scrubbing surface for fast, effective floor cleaning. Also sports a 10in. wide scraper for tough areas. Sturdy 3/4in. steel handle with hanger hole. U.S.A. Material: Polymer/steel, Product Type: Brushes, Includes (qty.): 1, Length (in.): 52, Handle Length (in.): 52, Product Style: Floor scrub
feature_bullets: Steel handle with convenient hanger tip screws right into the floor scrub
Perfectly flat scrubber head to get water and dirt out of deep cracks and rough surfaces
Fibers are not flagged to withstand heavy debris and rough surfaces as a wet or dry scrubber
52" total floor scrub height with a 10.5"x3.5" scrubbing surface and 1.3" long, scrubbing fibers
Quality made in the USA since 1896

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
